explains: v. 执行，贯彻；为……提供工具
n. 工具，器具；<苏格兰>履行；手段
wordGroup: implement plan 执行计划，实施计划
stone implement 石器；石器用具

sentences.en: Leadership is about the ability to implement change.
sentences.cn: 领导才能是一种实行变革的能力。

sentences.en: He tried to implement a technocratic economic policy.
sentences.cn: 他试图实施一项技术统治论主义的经济政策。

sentences.en: It's still not clear how far the Russian parliament will go to implement its own plans.
sentences.cn: 现在还不清楚俄罗斯议会在实施其计划方面会极端到何种程度。
